fields.name: ConnectionStringPrimaryKey
fields.description: PrimaryConnectionString of the endpoint for key-based authentication. Will be obfuscated during read.

fields.name: ConnectionStringSecondaryKey
fields.description: SecondaryConnectionString of the endpoint for key-based authentication. Will be obfuscated during read.

fields.name: EndpointUri
fields.description: The URL of the EventHub namespace for identity-based authentication. It must include the protocol 'sb://'.

fields.name: EntityPath
fields.description: The EventHub name in the EventHub namespace for identity-based authentication.
